attributes.action: Propose a vote of no confidence in the speaker John Bercow
attributes.additional_details: John Bercow's comments can be viewed on the BBC web site at http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/uk-politics-38889941
attributes.background: John Bercow made a comment from the speakers chair accusing the US president of "racism and sexism" the speakers position is an honorable one, and one of neutrality, no comments should be made by the speaker for or against any topic
